ModMetaData.name: Animals Forage - Patches
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/WAEzk68.png[/img] A collection of patches for [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2381741432]Animals Forage[/url] to add foraging for animals from other mods.
Foraging resources and animals supported:
[h3]Fish[/h3] [list] [*]Enhydriodon, Palaeeudyptes, Gomphotaria - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1055485938]Megafauna[/url] [*]Penguin, Fishercat, Otter, Walrus, Spotted Seal, Fisher - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2208467668]AnimalCollabProj[/url] [*]Fisher - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2090705625]Erin's Critter Collection[/url] [*]Anaconda - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2188840249]HC_Animal_2[/url] [*]Crocodile, Alligator - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2207620932]HC_Animal_4[/url] [*]Mud Snake - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2070686241]Legacy Ark[/url] [*]Baryonyx, Spinosaurus, Pteranodon, Deinocheirus - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=1136958577]Dinosauria[/url] [*]Baryonyx, Deinosuchus, Geosternbergia, Nyctosaurus, Pterodon, Sarcosuchus, Spinosaurus, Tanystropheus, Tupandactylus - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=1419618659]Jurassic Rimworld[/url] [*]Otter - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1895364938]VAE - Boreal Forest[/url] [/list] [h3]Bamboo from [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2007061826]VGP Vegetable Garden[/url][/h3] [list] [*]Giant Panda - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2366589898]VAE - Endangered[/url] [*]Red Panda - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2260502331]VAE - Temperate Forest[/url] [*]Panda, Red Panda - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2208467668]AnimalCollabProj[/url] [*]Red Panda - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=1970508422]Forest Critters[/url] [*]Panda - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2028973691]Tropi[CKAPP] Rainforest Mod[/url] [/list] [h3]Bugs (Insect meat)[/h3] [list] [*]Kiwi, Silkie Chicken, Duck-billed Platypus - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2208467668]AnimalCollabProj[/url] [*]Armadillo, Hedgehog - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2090705625]Erin's Critter Collection[/url] [*]Jungle Fowl - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2028973691]Tropi[CKAPP] Rainforest Mod[/url] [*]Badger, Green Snake - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2070686241]Legacy Ark[/url] [*]Badger - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2236973780]Westerado[/url] [*]Compsognathus - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=1136958577]Dinosauria[/url] [*]Archaeopteryx, Beelzebufo, Compsognathus, Hylonomus, Hynerpeton, Platyhystrix, Rhamphorhynchus - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=1419618659]Jurassic Rimworld[/url] [/list] [h3]Fungus[/h3] [list] [*]Peccary - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2208467668]AnimalCollabProj[/url] [*]Giant Boars - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2243330771]LotR - Dwarves[/url] [*]Daeodon - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1055485938]Megafauna[/url] [/list] [h3]Berries[/h3] [list] [*]Black Bear - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2208467668]AnimalCollabProj[/url] [*]Black Bear - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2236973780]Westerado[/url] [*]Short-Faced Bear - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1055485938]Megafauna[/url] [/list] [h3]Bones from [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1180573408]Rim of Madness - Bones[/url][/h3] [list] [*]Warg - Vanilla [*]Vulture - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2086753781]BIRD UP! Vulture[/url] [*]Raven - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2090295877]BIRD UP! Raven[/url] [*]Spotted Hyena, Striped Hyena - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2255067914]Hyena[/url] [*]Hyena - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2196951034]HC_Animal_3[/url] [*]Hyena - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1849183875]VAE - Desert[/url] [*]Coyote - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2236973780]Westerado[/url] [*]Coyote - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1836900626]VAE - Arid Shrubland[/url] [*]Arctic Coyote - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1895364938]VAE - Boreal Forest[/url] [*]Tasmanian Devil - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2366589898]VAE - Endangered[/url] [*]Tasmanian Devil - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2000213010]Tasmanian Devils[/url] [*]Dinocrocuta - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1055485938]Megafauna[/url] [*]Megawolverine - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1895364585]VAE - Tundra[/url] [*]American Possum - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2260426720]American Possum[/url] [*]Quetzalcoatlus, Carnotaurus, Tyrannosaurus Rex, Yutyrannus, Allosaurus - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=1136958577]Dinosauria[/url] [*]Albertosaurus, Allosaurus, Becklespinax, Carnotaurus, Ceratosaurus, Giganotosaurus, Metriacanthosaurus, Quetzalcoatlus, Rajasaurus, Tyrannosaurus Rex, Yangchuanosaurus, Yutyrannus - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=1419618659]Jurassic Rimworld[/url] [/list] [h3]Rat Meat[/h3] [list] [*]Rattlesnake - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2236973780]Westerado[/url] [*]Adders, Black Desert Cobras - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1430501911]Infectious Creatures[/url] [*]Copperhead, Coral Snake, Cottonmouth, Timber Rattler, Red Rattler, Scarlet King Snake, Yellow Viper - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2070686241]Legacy Ark[/url] [/list] [h3]Capybara Meat[/h3] [list] [*]Dinilysia, Gigantophis, Wonambi, Yurlunggur - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=1419618659]Jurassic Rimworld[/url] [/list] [h3]Josephoartigasia Meat from [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1055485938]Megafauna[/url][/h3] [list] [*]Titanoboa - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1055485938]Megafauna[/url] [/list]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/AnimalsForagePatches][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Rs6T6cr.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
